properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

A modern and well-maintained three bedroom townhouse situated in a quiet residential location in Orpington. The property offers spacious and flexible accommodation across multiple levels, including a bright living area, a contemporary fitted kitchen, and three generously sized bedrooms. Additional benefits include modern bathrooms, ample storage, and easy access to local amenities, schools, and transport links.

This spacious four bedroom flat is presented in excellent decorative order and offers modern open-plan living throughout. The property features a large living and dining area with a fully fitted contemporary kitchen, four well-proportioned bedrooms, and stylish bathroom facilities. Ideal for families or investors, the flat is conveniently located close to local shops, transport connections, and green spaces.

A substantial and impressive five bedroom family home located in a sought-after area of Orpington. This property offers generous living space including multiple reception rooms, a modern fitted kitchen, and five spacious bedrooms. The home is ideal for growing families and benefits from excellent transport links, nearby schools, and local amenities.

A compact and well-presented one bedroom flat, ideal for first-time buyers or buy-to-let investors. The property features a bright living area, a fitted kitchen, a comfortable double bedroom, and a modern bathroom. Conveniently located close to Orpington town centre, the flat offers easy access to transport links and local amenities.
